medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrence of anterior corneal pathologies after phototherapeutic keratectomy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Disease recurrence was symptomatic in all 8 eyes treated for anterior basement membrane dystrophy and 2 eyes treated for lattice dystrophy, with significant recurrence developing at an average of 7.8, 12.4, 13.5, 19.7, and 23.7 months after PTK for band keratopathy, ABMD, MCD, lattice dystrophy, and granular dystrophy respectively.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anterior basement membrane dystrophy (ABMD), band keratopathy, granular dystrophy, lattice dystrophy, and macular corneal dystrophy (MCD).
medical_history.family_history: Family history of dystrophy affected grandmother and mother of one patient.
